import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const BlogAdd = () => { const [htmlFormData, sethtmlFormData] = useState({ title: "", content: "", category: "", file: null, }); const [user, setUser] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { const ls = localStorage.getItem("user"); setUser(JSON.parse(ls)); }, []); const [uploading, setUploading] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target.value; sethtmlFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [name]: value, })); }; console.log(user); return (

Hi {user.username}

{/*

This inhtmlFormation will be displayed publicly so be careful what you share.

*/}

Write your blog content here.

or drag and drop

PNG, JPG, GIF up to 10MB

); }; export default BlogAdd; { /*
*/ }
